00046     TransportProtocol_TCP_SERVER,

00185     inline bool hasOpt (map<string,string> &opts, const string &key) {
00186       return (opts.count(key) > 0);
00187     }
00188 
00190     inline int getSocketOptionInt (map<string,string> &opts, const string &key, int32_t def=INT32_NULL) {
00191       if (!hasOpt(opts,key)) return def;
00192       return atoi(opts[key].c_str());
00193     }
00194 
00196     inline int getSocketOptionBool (map<string,string> &opts, const string &key, bool def=false) {
00197       if (!hasOpt(opts,key)) return def;
00198       return Utilities::toBooleanValue(opts[key]);
00199     }
00200   } END_NAMESPACE

00210   class Socket : public VRTObject {
00211     private: TransportProtocol  transport;  // The socket type
00212     private: int                sock;       // The POSIX socket (-1 if not open, -2 if null)
00213     private: int                mtu;        // The socket MTU (-N if n/a)
00214     private: struct sockaddr_in addr;       // The socket address
00215     private: int                soTimeout;  // Socket timeout in ms (SO_TIMEOUT in Java)
00216     private: bool               shutdownRW; // Stops read/write
00217 
00219     private: Socket (TransportProtocol transport);
00220 
00222     private: Socket (TransportProtocol transport, const string &host, int32_t port) ;
00223 
00225     public: ~Socket ();
00226 
00227     public: virtual string toString () const;
00228 
00229     public: virtual inline bool isNullValue () const {
00230       return (sock == -2);
00231     }
00232 
00234     public: inline TransportProtocol getTransportProtocol () const {
00235       return transport;
00236     }
00237 
00239     private: InetAddress getInetAddress () const {
00240       return (isNullValue())? InetAddress() : InetAddress(addr.sin_addr);
00241     }
00242 
00244     private: int32_t getPort () const {
00245       return (isNullValue())? INT32_NULL : ntohs(addr.sin_port);
00246     }
00247 
00249     public: inline int32_t getMTU () const {
00250       return (mtu <= 0)? 1500 : mtu; // 1500 = IP default
00251     }
00252 
00254     private: bool isMulticast () const {
00255       return !isNullValue() && getInetAddress().isMulticastAddress();
00256     }
00257 
00259     public: inline bool isOpen () const {
00260       return (sock > 0);
00261     }
00262 
00268     public: void shutdownSocket ();
00269 
00271     public: void close ();
00272 
00278     private: bool isSocketReady ();
00279 
00291     public: int32_t read (void *buf, int32_t len);
00292 
00304     public: inline int32_t read (void *buf, size_t len) {
00305       return read(buf, (int32_t)len);
00306     }
00307 
00317     public: int32_t write (const void *buf, int32_t len);
00318 
00328     public: int32_t write (const void *buf, size_t len) {
00329       return write(buf, (int32_t)len);
00330     }
00331 
00340     public: Socket* accept (map<string,string> &options) __attribute__((warn_unused_result));
00341 
00355     public: static Socket* createUDPSocket (bool isOutput, const string &host, int32_t port,
00356                                             const string &device, map<string,string> &options,
00357                                             int32_t bufLength) __attribute__((warn_unused_result));
00358 
00372     public: static Socket* createTCPServerSocket (bool isOutput, const string &host, int32_t port,
00373                                                   const string &device, map<string,string> &options,
00374                                                   int32_t bufLength) __attribute__((warn_unused_result));
00375 
00389     public: static Socket* createTCPSocket (bool isOutput, const string &host, int32_t port,
00390                                             const string &device, map<string,string> &options,
00391                                             int32_t bufLength) __attribute__((warn_unused_result));
00392 
00394     private: Socket* initSocket (map<string,string> &opts, int32_t recvBuf=INT32_NULL,
00395                                  int32_t sendBuf=INT32_NULL);
00396   };
